definition: Major Historical and Cultural Site Protected at the National Level
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Zhong4 dian3 Wen2 wu4 Bao3 hu4 Dan1 wei4
containing_words.word: 全国重点文物保护单位

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wen2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: PRC State Administration of Cultural Heritage (SACH)
National Commission for the Identification of Cultural Heritage
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wen2 wu4 Jian4 ding4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Xixia Tongguanshan India unearthed in 1983 for the objects.
sentences.chinese: 西夏铜官印1983年出土，为一级文物。

sentences.english: The history of those archaeologicalfinds goes back to the 2ndcentury.
sentences.chinese: 这些历史文物的发现可追溯到2世纪。

sentences.english: Agency of historical relics preservations include other historical relics institutions.
sentences.chinese: 文物保护管理所包括其它文物机构。

sentences.english: Agency of historical relics preservations include other historical relics institutions.
sentences.chinese: 文物保护管理所包括其它文物机构。

sentences.english: No unit or individual may have cultural relics transferred without approval.
sentences.chinese: 未经批准，任何单位或者个人不得调取文物。

sentences.english: The nation's cultural relics chief is opposed to the blind reconstruction of old city towns.
sentences.chinese: 国家文物局局长反对盲目改造旧城。

sentences.english: A lot of precious historical relics are displayed in Xiangfan Museum.
sentences.chinese: 襄樊博物馆展出了许多珍贵的历史文物。

sentences.english: “Most of the pieces that were stolen from the National Museum will come back,” Mr. Zubaidi said.
sentences.chinese: 国家博物馆的大多数被劫文物都会完璧归赵。

sentences.english: The gold and silver plates of Liao dynasty are beautiful flowers of the northern nomadic people.
sentences.chinese: 辽代金银器是北方草原地区民族历史文物的一支奇葩。

sentences.english: Now, the cultural-relic department determines to repair the Buddha and recondition its vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 文物部门决定重修大佛，重整大佛及周边环境。

sentences.english: A national treasure – Dragon Carved Bronze Plate – dated back to late Shang Dynasty is preserved here.
sentences.chinese: 现有晚商时期的国宝级文物青铜蟠龙大盘。

sentences.english: President Hu and Queen Elizabeth II cut ribbon for the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛主席同伊丽莎白二世女王为文物展开幕剪彩。

sentences.english: Hebei is also one of the provinces of many cultural relics.
sentences.chinese: 河北的文物古迹更是俯拾皆是。

sentences.english: In its spacious halls are displayed over8000 priceless relics.
sentences.chinese: 在它宽敞的大厅里，展出了8000多件珍贵文物。

sentences.english: Gaochun has long history, deep cultural connotation and many heritage sites.
sentences.chinese: 高淳历史悠久，文化底蕴深厚，文物遗存较多。

sentences.english: Mount Taishan aBounds in lofty peaks, deep valleys and rare cultural relics of the ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 泰山有许多高峰深谷和丰富的古代珍贵文物。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
Dangu district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
PRC State Administration of Cultural Heritage (SACH)
